message.content:
cs.CR, cs.HC, cs.SY, cs.CY, cs.MM

The paper discusses a security issue in transparent authentication schemes, which falls under the category of computer security (cs.CR). The proposed solution involves using low-cost sensors commonly available on personal devices, which suggests a human-computer interaction (cs.HC) aspect. The system also involves trajectory recognition, which falls under the category of control systems (cs.SY) and cybernetics (cs.CY). Finally, the paper mentions empirical data collected using a TRec prototype, which suggests a multimedia (cs.MM) aspect.
